## Next hook based on this SO answer: https://stackoverflow.com/a/39025054
knit_hooks$set(
  prompt = function(before, options, envir) {
    options(
      prompt = if (options$engine %in% c('sh','bash')) '$ ' else 'R> ',
      continue = if (options$engine %in% c('sh','bash')) '$ ' else '+ '
    )
  })
